Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Having someone teach something so that you can ask questions and they can explain it in multiple ways is much more beneficial than AI, even if it is easily accessible and generally decently accurate.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback always feels more honest, trustworthy and personal. Though I still sometimes use GenAI, I don't rely on it if I quickly want some feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The feedback from GenAI feels robotic (which I guess is to be expected) while from a teacher the feedback feels like it has more meaning and positive intent.
